thread.title: Amber Alert For All Of Pennsylvania As Authorities Look For Missing 2-Year-Old Girl
thread.title_full: Amber Alert For All Of Pennsylvania As Authorities Look For Missing 2-Year-Old Girl

author: CBS Philly
title: Amber Alert For All Of Pennsylvania As Authorities Look For Missing 2-Year-Old Girl
text:
Amber Alert For All Of Pennsylvania As Authorities Look For Missing 2-Year-Old Girl February 5, 2017 8:45 PM (Credit: CBS) 
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) â€” The Pennsylvania State Police has issued an Amber Child Abduction Alert for the Bloomsburg Barracks Columbia County after a young girl was abducted. 
The Civil Authorities issued a Child Abduction Emergency for all of Pennsylvania ending at 11:24 p.m. 
On Feb. 5, 2017 at approximately 7:00 p.m., 2-year-old Alexis Weber was abducted from 2200 West Front Street, Berwick, Columbia County, Pennsylvania. 
She was last seen wearing a white coat, blue polka dot shirt and black pants. 
Weber was inside a 2005 yellow Ford Convertible Mustang, bearing Pennsylvania Registration HWN-1367. 
The vehicle was stolen by an unknown suspect and fled the area towards Laporte, Pennsylvania.
